castVote(uint256,uint8).details: Only callable during the voting period for that proposal. One address can only vote once.

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to vote on.
params.voteType: Whether to support, not support or abstain.

castVoteBySignature(uint256,uint8,uint8,.details: Only callable during the voting period for that proposal. One voter can only vote once.

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to vote on.
params.r: the r field of the signature.
params.s: the s field of the signature.
params.v: the v field of the signature.
params.voteType: Whether to support, not support or abstain.

constructor.details: Setting high proposal threshold locks propose action, which also lock vote actions.

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to execute.

returns.proposedActions: Array of tuple of proposed actions.

returns.proposalWrapper: Tuple wrapper of the proposal and proposed actions tuples.

returns._0: The current voting power of the given account.

initializeGovernance().details: Params are stored in factory and read from there.

returns._0: Human readable string of the name.

returns.proposalWrapper: Tuple array of all governance proposals.

propose((address,bytes,uint256)[],string.details: Must have at least `proposalThreshold` of voting power to call this function.

params.actions: The proposed actions. An action specifies a contract call.
params.description: A text description for the proposal.

returns.proposalId: The ID of the newly created proposal.

updateThresholds(uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by the governance contract itself.Thresholds can only be updated via a successful governance proposal.

params.newProposalThreshold: The new value for the proposal threshold.
params.newQuorumThreshold: The new value for the quorum threshold.

params.newImplementation: Address of the new governance implementation contract.

upgradeStrategy(address).details: Only callable by the governance contract itself.

params.newStrategy: Address of the new strategy contract.

ProposalCreated(address,uint256,(address.notice: Emitted when a new proposal is created.

ProposalExecuted(uint256).notice: Emitted when a proposal is executed.

StrategyUpgraded(address).notice: Emmited when the governance strategy is upgraded.

ThresholdsUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when voting thresholds get updated.

Upgraded(address).notice: Emitted when implementation written to proxy storage.

castVote(uint256,uint8).notice: Casts a vote for the given proposal.

castVoteBySignature(uint256,uint8,uint8,.notice: Casts a vote for the given proposal, by signature.

constructor.notice: Constructor has no inputs to guarantee same deterministic address across chains.

execute(uint256).notice: Executes a proposal that has passed and is currently executable.

getActions(uint256).notice: Returns the actions proposed for a given proposal.

getProposalById(uint256).notice: Returns a proposal for a given id.

getProposalState(uint256).notice: Returns the state of a proposal.

getReceipt(uint256,address).notice: Returns the receipt of a voter for a given proposal.

getVotingPower(address).notice: Computes the current voting power of the given account.

name().notice: Returns the name of the governace.

proposalCount().notice: Returns the total number of proposals.

proposals().notice: Returns all proposals ever made to the governance.

propose((address,bytes,uint256)[],string.notice: Creates a proposal on the the given actions. Must have at least `proposalThreshold`.

updateThresholds(uint256,uint256).notice: Updates the proposal and quorum thresholds to the given values.
